nodes.text: Operation Take Down was the final of four small operations led by Darth Vader against the Rebel Alliance in 1.5 ABY. Its goal was to eliminate agents of the Alliance Special Forces. Vader recruited an agent of the Imperial Special Forces who subsequently hunted down and killed ten high-ranking rebel agents.
This is the final of four missions in Star Wars Galaxies that players of the Imperial faction receive from Lord Vader during one of his sporadic appearances in Bestine, Coronet or Theed.

The player has to kill 10 players of the Rebel faction to accomplish the mission and receives 25,000 credits and
500 imperial faction points as reward upon completion.
